title: News24.com | Lockdown: OR Tambo airport bustling as scores of travellers make their way home
description: OR Tambo International Airport, one of Africa's busiest airports, is bustling, especially at international departures as the country's nationwide lockdown looms.
content:
OR Tambo International Airport, one of Africa's busiest airports, was bustling on Wednesday morning, especially at international departures as the country's nationwide lockdown loomed.
